question:
Give the mechanism and major product for the reaction of a secondary haloalkane in a polar aprotic solvent with the following nucleophiles. The $pK_a$ value of the conjugate acid of the nucleophile is given in parentheses.
(a) $N3^-$ (4.6)
(b) $H_2N^-$ (35) 
(c) $NH_3$ (9.5)
(d) $HSe^-$ (3.7)
(e) $F^-$ (3.2)
(f) $C_6H_5O^-$ (9.9)
(g) $PH_3$ (-12)
(h) $NH_2OH$ (6.0)
(i) $NCS^-$ (-0.7)
